DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy safety Alcon Ex-PRESS™ Glaucoma Filtration Device ( Ex-PRESS ) Japanese patient normal tension glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: Alcon Ex-PRESS™ Glaucoma Filtration Device Japanese Patients
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis normal tension glaucoma . Indicated filtration surgery use ExPRESS . Understand provide Informed Consent . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Women pregnant , lactating , plan pregnant study period . Diagnosis angle closure glaucoma secondary glaucoma . History glaucoma surgery . Ophthalmologic surgery within past 6 month . Difficulty applanation tonometry measurement . Corneal dystrophy . Infectious/noninfectious conjunctivitis , keratitis , uveitis either eye . Severe blepharitis dry eye . History metal allergy . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
